lore: In Mikhail's continent, technology evolved at a much faster speed, which resulted in the creation of, among other things, devastating weapons more advanced than anything that could be conceived in the nations where magic was a reality. In the end, one such weapon destroyed all civilization on the other side of the Veil, after Mikhail had joined the Auditors.\n\nThe body of the Toxdweller Decoy is covered with a fiber that absorbs the toxic fluids it encounters.
menagerieDialog: (It never blinks. Ever. It's very creepy.)
(It doesn't have eyelids, which instantly makes it one of the most disconcerting creatures in the entire Menagerie.)
(This creature reminds you of Spoonor, so you can't help but treat it a little worse than the others.)
(It's eating some disgusting-looking muck that it apparently found on the ground. Weirdo.)
name: Toxdweller Decoy
